meanings.definition: A meal or party to which each of the guests contributes a dish.
meanings.sent1: We had a potluck at the picnic where everyone brought a different dish.
meanings.sent2: The office party was a potluck, so I decided to make my famous pasta salad.
meanings.sent3: At the potluck, it was funny how we ended up with five different types of potato salad!
meanings.sent4: The potluck of flavors at the party created a delicious harmony on the taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The potluck was a feast of diverse flavors and culinary delights.

meanings.definition: A meal consisting of whatever food happens to be available.
meanings.sent1: When I got home late, I had to make a potluck dinner from the leftovers in the fridge.
meanings.sent2: During the camping trip, we often had potluck meals with whatever ingredients we had left.
meanings.sent3: It was a potluck night at home, so we ended up with a strange mix of spaghetti and pickles.
meanings.sent4: The potluck of snacks in the pantry was a strange combination of sweet and salty treats.
meanings.sent5: The potluck dinner was a surprise mix of flavors, but surprisingly tasty.
